EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Invite - New York
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Cloud Platform Seminar - New York
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, July 16, 2015 Pivotal New York 625 Avenue of the Americas 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/cloud-platform-seminar/nyc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=field-marketing-q22015> Join Pivotal and CenturyLink to learn how software is transforming the world. At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal's Cloud Foundry platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. WHO SHOULD ATTEND The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all. Register <http://pivotal.io/cloud-platform-seminar/nyc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=field-marketing-q22015> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:10 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Keynote
10:00 AM - 10:15 AM Coffee Break
10:15 AM - 11:15 AM Customer Use Case
11:15 AM - 11:30 AM Coffee Break
11:30 AM - 12:30 PM Session: Lab 1
12:30 PM - 1:30 PM Networking Lunch
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM Session: Lab 2
4:00 PM Wrap Up VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/cloud-platform-seminar/nyc?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=field-marketing-q22015>
